com.stormpath.sdk.http

Interface HttpRequestBuilder


  • public interface HttpRequestBuilder
    A Builder design pattern used to construct HttpRequest instances.

    The HttpRequestBuilder is useful to build HttpRequest instances for developers that don't have access to the Servlet container, and therefore, cannot execute operations using implementations of the javax.servlet.HttpServlet api.

    Since:
    1.0.RC
    See Also:
    HttpRequest, HttpRequests, Application.authenticateApiRequest(Object), Application.authenticateOauthRequest(Object)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpRequest build()
      Returns a new HttpRequest instance reflecting the current builder state.
      HttpRequestBuilder headers(Map<String,String[]> headers)
      Sets the HTTP Headers that will be present in the resulting request instance.
      HttpRequestBuilder parameters(Map<String,String[]> parameters)
      Sets the request parameters that will be present in the resulting request instance.
      HttpRequestBuilder queryParameters(String queryParameters)
      Sets the query parameters that will be present in the resulting request instance.
